claims.claim: Incarcerated individuals lack necessary resources upon reentry.
claims.quote: And the challenge is them having the resources that they need. When they come out, that's the number one challenge.

claims.claim: Disconnection from society exacerbates challenges for returning citizens.
claims.quote: if the men and women that are incarcerated are not connected to the society in which they're going to return to, then all of the organizations combined do them a disservice.

claims.claim: Returning citizens are unaware of existing supportive organizations.
claims.quote: Because I'm gonna tell you something, if we're not connected, if the men and women that are incarcerated are not connected to the society in which they're going to return to, then all of the organizations combined do them a disservice. Because they not connected to 'em. They don't know 'em. They don't have no way of knowing that you even exist
